DOC.brief_summary: To investigate compare effect Traumeel®S tablet versus placebo recovery inflammatory immune response period 72 hour second bout strenuous concentric exercise bicycle ( exercise # 2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Traumeel®S Tablets Recovery Inflammatory Immune Response After Repeated Bouts Exercise
DOC.criteria: Sex : male Age ≥ 18 ≤ 40 year BMI ≥ 18.5 < 27,5 kg/m2 ( WHO standard normal range BMI ) Maximum relative oxygen uptake ( VO2max ) < 53 ml/kg x min General state good health Nonsmoker Medically approve unrestricted participation sport show diagnostic performance test conduct treadmill longer 3 month prior study entry Willingness provide sign informed consent Weekly training volume ≥ 6 hour Use dietary supplement ( incl . highdosed vitamin mineral ) Chronic immune deficiency Current infection Heart and/or circulation disorder Abnormal finding exercise ECG Musculoskeletal disorder Any current clinical condition require systemic treatment might impact study objective Hypersensitivity botanical Compositae family ( e.g . Echinacea ) Lactose intolerance Illicit drug alcohol abuse Participation another clinical trial within 4 week prior study entry
